Description: THIS LISTING IS FOR A 2004 RICKENBACKER 360-12 12 STRING GUITAR WITH FACTORY-INSTALLED TOASTER PICKUPS IN THE HIGHLY SOUGHT-AFTER RICKENBACKER "COLOR OF THE YEAR" MONTEZUMA BROWN, WHICH HAD TO BE SPECIAL-ORDERED AT HIGHER COST THROUGH RICKENBACKER DEALERS WHILE THE COLOR WAS AVAILABLE. THE GUITAR HAS A BEAUTIFUL MONTEZUMA BROWN BURST FINISH OVER WELL-MATCHED, EVEN GRAIN AND IT HAS BEEN UPGRADED WITH GOLD-PAINTED PLEXI PICKGUARDS, VINTAGE-STYLE BROWN AND GOLD OVEN KNOBS FOR THE TONE AND VOLUME CONTROLS, AND A VINTAGE-STYLE SMALL BLACK KNOB FOR THE "MIXER" CONTROL. THE RAISED-LETTER TRUSS ROD COVER HAS BEEN PAINTED GOLD TO MATCH. *** IF YOU PREFER THE FACTORY STOCK APPEARANCE, I CAN REMOVE THE GOLD GUARDS, OVEN KNOBS AND GOLD-PAINTED TRUSS ROD COVER AND SHIP THE GUITAR INSTEAD WITH STANDARD FACTORY COMPONENTS: WHITE PICKGUARDS, A WHITE RAISED LETTER TRUSS ROD COVER, AND YOUR CHOICE OF MODERN BLACK INDICATOR KNOBS WITH SILVER CAPS OR VINTAGE-STYLE ALL-BLACK INDICATOR KNOBS. *** THE GUITAR COMES WITH A RICKENBACKER SKB CASE WITH BLACK LINING (LOOKS BLUE IN SOME OF THE PHOTOS) IN EXCELLENT CONDITION WITH LIGHT CLOSET WEAR. ALSO INCLUDED ARE THE ORIGINAL, COMPLETE RICKENBACKER WARRANTY CARD (THE CARD WAS NEVER SUBMITTED) AND TWO CASE KEYS (NOT PICTURED). CONDITION: THE GUITAR WAS COLLECTOR-OWNED AND IT'S A CASE QUEEN IN INCREDIBLY CLEAN CONDITION WITH UNBLEMISHED SURFACES - THE GUITAR LOOKS LIKE IT JUST CAME FROM THE FACTORY. THERE ARE A FEW MINISCULE, TRIVIAL SPOTS IN THE HEADSTOCK GROOVES AND JOINT SEAMS WHERE THE MONTEZUMA BROWN FINISH WAS SPRAYED THIN/DID NOT ADHERE, AND THERE IS SOME MISSING BLACK PAINT ON THE "RIC-O-SOUND" JACKPLATE LETTERING. FROM A SMOKE-FREE HOME. A TERRIFIC INSTRUMENT IN A RARE COLOR IF YOU'RE A FAN OF THE BEATLES, THE BYRDS, GEORGE HARRISON, TOM PETTY, PETE TOWNSHEND, ROGER McGUINN, ETC. PLEASE SEE THE PHOTOS FOR MORE DETAILS. MONTEZUMA BROWN 12-STRING RICKENBACKERS IN THIS CONDITION ARE GETTING VERY DIFFICULT TO FIND. INSURED, SIGNATURE DELIVERY UPS GROUND SHIPPING IS A FLAT $75 TO THE USA; IF THE SHIPPING COSTS LESS I WILL REFUND YOU THE DIFFERENCE, IF IT'S MORE THE EXTRA COST IS ON ME. THIS GUITAR SHIPS TO THE USA, LOWER 48 STATES ONLY. THE FINE PRINT -- PLEASE READ CAREFULLY!!!: I WILL SHIP THIS GUITAR TO THE USA, LOWER 48 STATES ONLY, ABSOLUTELY NO EXCEPTIONS. SHIPMENT TO PAYPAL CONFIRMED ADDRESS ONLY. I RESERVE THE RIGHT TO RE-LIST IF PAYMENT IS NOT MADE PROMPTLY AS REQUIRED. SORRY, NO NEGATIVE OR ZERO FEEDBACK BIDDERS. I RESERVE THE RIGHT TO REFUSE TO SELL TO ANYONE -- UNFORTUNATELY, A FEW IRRESPONSIBLE CHARACTERS HAVE MADE LIFE DIFFICULT FOR THE REST OF US. CHECK MY FEEDBACK AND PLEASE, PLEASE ASK ANY QUESTIONS THAT YOU HAVE BEFORE YOU BID. I AM NOT A DEALER, NO RETURNS. THE GUITAR WILL BE WELL-PACKED TO ENSURE SAFE DELIVERY.
Title: 2004 RICKENBACKER 360-12 STRING GUITAR MONTEZUMA BROWN, GOLD GUARDS, TOASTERS!!
